mapper.select: SELECT Z.* FROM ( SELECT '' AS FILE_TRGT_KEY , I.CO_NM --회사명 , I.CO_CD , I.PCHS_CLNT_CD , I.PCHS_CLMN_NM , I.IN_NO , I.IN_SEQ , I.SALES_CD --Sales Code , I.MATR_CD --품번 , I.CURR_CD , I.EXRATE , I.WH_CD --입고창고 , I.MATR_WH_NM --입고창고명 , I.IN_QTY --입고수량 , M.MATR_NM --자재품명 , M.MATR_SPEC --자재규격 , M.MATR_MAT --자재소재 , M.MATR_MAKR_NM --자재메이커 , M.MATR_MNO --자재형번 , 'N' AS CHK --체크여부 , I.RETURN_PRC --반품단가 , 0 AS RETURN_SUM --반품긍액 , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_SM06D01 AS T WHERE T.IN_NO = I.IN_NO AND T.IN_SEQ = I.IN_SEQ AND T.SALES_CD = I.SALES_CD ) AS CNT , I.DSGN_NO FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT R.CODE_NM AS CO_NM --회사코드 , I.CO_CD , Z.PCHS_CLNT_CD --구매업체코드 , ( SELECT D.CLNT_NM FROM TB_BM02M01 AS D WHERE Z.PCHS_CLNT_CD = D.CLNT_CD ) AS PCHS_CLMN_NM , I.IN_NO -- 입고번호 , I.IN_SEQ -- 입고순서 , I.SALES_CD -- Sales Code , I.MATR_CD -- 품번 , I.WH_CD -- 입고창고 , R1.CODE_NM AS MATR_WH_NM -- 입고창고명 , I.CURR_CD , I.EXRATE , I.IN_QTY -- 입고수량 , I.IN_PRC AS RETURN_PRC -- 입고단가 , T.DSGN_NO FROM TB_SM03D01 AS I LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R ON R.CODE_ID = I.CO_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R1 ON R1.CODE_ID = I.WH_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SM02D01 AS T ON T.CO_CD = I.CO_CD AND T.ORDRG_NO = I.ORDRG_NO AND T.ORDRG_SEQ = I.ORDRG_SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SM02M01 AS Z ON Z.ORDRG_NO = I.ORDRG_NO WHERE 1 = 1 ) AS I LEFT JOIN TB_BM05M01 AS M ON M.MATR_CD = I.MATR_CD WHERE 1 = 1 AND I.CO_CD = #{coCd} AND I.SALES_CD = #{salesCd} AND I.PCHS_CLNT_CD = #{pchsClntCd} AND I.IN_NO = #{inNumber} ) AS Z WHERE 1 = 1 AND Z.CNT = 0

SELECT DISTINCT A.FILE_TRGT_KEY , A.CO_CD , A.SALES_CD , O.CLNT_CD , O.CLNT_NM , A.PCHS_CLNT_CD , ( SELECT D.CLNT_NM FROM TB_BM02M01 AS D WHERE A.PCHS_CLNT_CD = D.CLNT_CD ) AS PCHS_CLNT_NM , O.CLNT_PJT AS CLNT_PJT_CD , O.CLNT_PJT_NM AS CLNT_PJT , O.PRDT_CD , O.PRDT_NM , O.ITEM_DIV , O.ITEM_DIV_NM , O.EQP_NM , A.RET_NO , TO_CHAR(A.RET_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS IO_DT , A.RET_RMK AS IO_RMK , B.IN_NO AS IN_NUM --입고번호 , B.RET_SEQ , B.DSGN_NO , B.MATR_CD , M.MATR_NM --자재품명 , M.MATR_SPEC --자재규격 , M.MATR_MAT --자재소재 , M.MATR_MAKR_NM --자재메이커 , M.MATR_MNO --자재형번 , B.RET_QTY , B.RET_DTL_AMT AS RETURN_SUM , B.INOUT_KEY , 0 AS RETURN_QTY --재고수량 , '' AS CHK --체크여부 , 0 AS RETURN_SUM , '' AS dtaChk FROM TB_SM06M01 AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SM06D01 AS B ON B.CO_CD = A.CO_CD AND B.RET_NO = A.RET_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SM03D01 AS X ON X.CO_CD = B.CO_CD AND X.IN_NO = B.IN_NO AND X.IN_SEQ = B.IN_SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT SM.CO_CD --회사 , SM.ORDRS_NO --수주번호 , TO_CHAR(SM.ORDRS_CLNT_CD) AS CLNT_CD --고객사 , C.CLNT_NM AS CLNT_NM --고객사명 , SM.CLNT_PJT --고객사PJT , R1.CODE_NM AS CLNT_PJT_NM , SD.PRDT_CD --제품구분 , P.PRDT_NM , SD.ITEM_DIV --아이템구분 , R.CODE_NM AS ITEM_DIV_NM , SD.SALES_CD --SalesCode , SD.EQP_NM --설비명 FROM TB_CR02M01 AS SM LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CR02D02 AS SD ON SD.CO_CD = SM.CO_CD AND SD.ORDRS_NO = SM.ORDRS_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM02M01 AS C ON C.CLNT_CD = SM.ORDRS_CLNT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM01M01 AS P ON P.PRDT_CD = SD.PRDT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R ON R.CODE_ID = SD.ITEM_DIV LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R1 ON R1.CODE_ID = SM.CLNT_PJT WHERE 1 = 1 ) AS O ON O.SALES_CD = A.SALES_CD LEFT JOIN TB_BM05M01 AS M ON M.MATR_CD = B.MATR_CD WHERE A.FILE_TRGT_KEY = #{fileTrgtKey} AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT DISTINCT A.FILE_TRGT_KEY , A.CO_CD , A.SALES_CD , O.CLNT_CD , O.CLNT_NM , A.PCHS_CLNT_CD , ( SELECT D.CLNT_NM FROM TB_BM02M01 AS D WHERE A.PCHS_CLNT_CD = D.CLNT_CD ) AS PCHS_CLMN_NM , O.CLNT_PJT , O.CLNT_PJT_NM , O.PRDT_CD , O.PRDT_NM , O.ITEM_DIV , O.ITEM_DIV_NM , O.EQP_NM , A.RET_NO , TO_CHAR(A.RET_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS IO_DT , A.RET_RMK AS IO_RMK , B.IN_NO --입고번호 , B.RET_SEQ , B.DSGN_NO , B.MATR_CD , M.MATR_NM --자재품명 , M.MATR_SPEC --자재규격 , M.MATR_MAT --자재소재 , M.MATR_MAKR_NM --자재메이커 , M.MATR_MNO --자재형번 , B.RET_QTY AS OUT_QTY , B.RET_DTL_AMT AS RETURN_SUM , B.INOUT_KEY , X.IN_QTY --입고수량 , X.IN_PRC AS RETURN_PRC --입고단가 , X.WH_CD --입고창고 , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(X.WH_CD) AS MATR_WH_NM --입고창고명 , 'N' AS CHK --체크여부 , 'U' AS dtaChk FROM TB_SM06M01 AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SM06D01 AS B ON B.CO_CD = A.CO_CD AND B.RET_NO = A.RET_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SM03D01 AS X ON X.CO_CD = B.CO_CD AND X.IN_NO = B.IN_NO AND X.IN_SEQ = B.IN_SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT SM.CO_CD --회사 , SM.ORDRS_NO --수주번호 , TO_CHAR(SM.ORDRS_CLNT_CD) AS CLNT_CD --고객사 , C.CLNT_NM AS CLNT_NM --고객사명 , SM.CLNT_PJT --고객사PJT , R1.CODE_NM AS CLNT_PJT_NM , SD.PRDT_CD --제품구분 , P.PRDT_NM , SD.ITEM_DIV --아이템구분 , R.CODE_NM AS ITEM_DIV_NM , SD.SALES_CD --SalesCode , SD.EQP_NM --설비명 FROM TB_CR02M01 AS SM LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CR02D02 AS SD ON SD.CO_CD = SM.CO_CD AND SD.ORDRS_NO = SM.ORDRS_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM02M01 AS C ON C.CLNT_CD = SM.ORDRS_CLNT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM01M01 AS P ON P.PRDT_CD = SD.PRDT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R ON R.CODE_ID = SD.ITEM_DIV LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R1 ON R1.CODE_ID = SM.CLNT_PJT WHERE 1 = 1 ) AS O ON O.SALES_CD = A.SALES_CD LEFT JOIN TB_BM05M01 AS M ON M.MATR_CD = B.MATR_CD WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.CO_CD = #{coCd} AND A.RET_NO = #{ioNo}

SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(RET_NO) IS NULL THEN 'RET'||SUBSTR(#{ioDt}, 3, 2)||'00001' ELSE 'RET'||SUBSTR(#{ioDt}, 3, 2)||LPAD(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MAX(RET_NO), -5)) + 1, 5, 0) END AS MNGM_NO FROM TB_SM06M01 WHERE CO_CD = #{coCd} AND RET_DT LIKE SUBSTR(#{ioDt}, 0, 4)||'%'
